Butterfly, provides sharing of live and recorded video and audio content
 
 If you use Butterfly, it means you agree the terms below.
 
 1. All responsibility for the broadcasts belong to their broadcaster.
 2. Butterfly can change the terms any time without any notification. Valid terms are the last updated terms even if it is retroactive.
 3. Butterfly team have the right to delete any video or audio content.
 4. It is forbidden to use any content which consist pornography or sexually explicit content and child exploitation.
 5. It is not allowed to use any content which negatively affect on viewers and may set a precedent such as: animal abuse, drug abuse, deceitfulness or bomb making.
 6. Contents which consist violence, or terrorism is not allowed. Please do not sent any video which shows some gross- out : someone getting hurt, attacked, or humiliated, don't post it.
 7. We don\’t permit any content which has hate speech, attacks or demeans for a group based on race or ethnic origin, religion, disability, gender, age, veteran status, and sexual orientation/gender identity.
 
 October 27, 2013
